descriptionNullable:
### Context

I was wondering if I could create a LSTM to generate anime like music and gathered this data to train it. May release a kernel soon.

### Content

There are many MIDI files with the notes of the songs. I would recommend music21 to parse notes/chords.


### Acknowledgements

Thanks to the people who created the MIDI files! Credits to [Fonzi](http://fonzimgm.weebly.com/midi-files.html) and [Kenzi](https://kenziesmithpiano.com/anime-midi/)!


### Inspiration

I want to see if its possible to create a AI that composes music thats comparable to anime OP's and hopefully infinitely/on loop, so it can be put on a stream.
title: Music MIDI Collection
subtitle: MIDI files from different sources
description:
### Context

I was wondering if I could create a LSTM to generate anime like music and gathered this data to train it. May release a kernel soon.

### Content

There are many MIDI files with the notes of the songs. I would recommend music21 to parse notes/chords.


### Acknowledgements

Thanks to the people who created the MIDI files! Credits to [Fonzi](http://fonzimgm.weebly.com/midi-files.html) and [Kenzi](https://kenziesmithpiano.com/anime-midi/)!


### Inspiration

I want to see if its possible to create a AI that composes music thats comparable to anime OP's and hopefully infinitely/on loop, so it can be put on a stream.
